body:
**Issue Template**

*Title*: Filesystem subscription assert failure, inotify_fd_ negative

*Description*:
Create a large config using filesystem based XDS, seems to crash every time with `assert failure: inotify_fd_ >= 0`

Running `envoyproxy/envoy-dev:829b905ca0fdc85233c3969247e53a62a52ac627` on Kubernetes

I have 226 different eds files and 14 different rds files

*Config*:
>Include the config used to configure Envoy.

```
    node:
      metadata:
        NODE_UID: node.default
        NODE_NAMESPACE: default
      id: node
      cluster: envoy
    admin:
      access_log_path: /dev/stdout
      address:
        socket_address:
          address: 0.0.0.0
          port_value: 15000

    dynamic_resources:
      lds_config:
        path: /etc/config/config/lds.yaml
      cds_config:
        path:  /etc/config/config/cds.yaml
```
I can provide all the xDS config if needed, just let me know. Its about 2mb which is why I didn't include it.
